subject: Hockey, Field
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Angie Loy scored two goals to lead the United States to a 7-0 victory over France at an Olympic qualifying tournament in Kazan, Russia. The Americans (3-0) have outscored their opponents, 17-2, at the six-team event, which they must win to advance to the Beijing Games. By winning the tournament, the Americans would compete in the Olympics for the first time since 1996, when they qualified as the host country.
